## length variable

Returns the number of elements in the array or string length.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
length: <T extends string | unknown[]>(val: T) => T["length"]
```

## Example


```ts
length('hello') // 5
length(['hello', 'world', 1]) // 3

```
